While-loop_key3: count +=2 really just means count = count + 2.
While-loop_key4: When this `loop` runs the first time, the value of count is 1, therefore count is printed
While-loop_key5: When this `loop` runs the second time, the value of count is 3, therefore count is printed
While-loop_key6: When this `loop` runs the third time, the value of count is 5, therefore count is printed
While-loop_key7: When this `loop` runs the fourth time, the value of count is 7, therefore count is printed
While-loop_key8: When this `loop` runs the fifth time, the value of count is 9, therefore count is printed
While-loop_key9: When this `loop` runs the sixth time, the value of count is 11. Clearly, 11>10, so the while `loop` will stop.
While-loop_key10: While `loop` helps us to `execute` a block of `code`. While runs upto a specified condition is `true` and stops once that condition is no longer `true`.
While-loop_key13: When this `loop` runs the first time, the value of i is 0, 0< 7 is `true`, 0%2 ==0 `true` ,therefore i is printed, and incremented i to 1
While-loop_key14: When this `loop` runs the second time, the value of i is 1, 1<7 `true`, 1%2 ==0 `false`, therefore i is not printed, and directly incremented to 2
While-loop_key15: When this `loop` runs the third time, the value of i is 2, 2< 7 is `true`, 2%2 ==0 `true` ,therefore i is printed, and incremented i to 3
While-loop_key16: When this `loop` runs the fourth time, the value of i is 3, 3<7 `true`, 3%2 ==0 `false`, therefore i is not printed, and directly incremented to 4
While-loop_key17: When this `loop` runs the fifth time, the value of i is 4, 4< 7 is `true`, 4%2 ==0 `true` ,therefore i is printed, and incremented i to 5
While-loop_key18: When this `loop` runs the sixth time,the value of i is 5, 5<7 `true`, 5%2 ==0 `false`, therefore i is not printed, and directly incremented to 6
While-loop_key19: When this `loop` runs the seventh time, the value of i is 6, 6< 7 is `true`, 6%2 ==0 `true` ,therefore i is printed, and incremented i to 7
While-loop_key20: When this `loop` runs the eighth time, the value of i is 7, clearly 7<7 is `false` so the `loop` breaks here.
